metadata.title: CVE-2024-40958 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
